texts.name: Mia
texts.biography: It is said that Mia was born with a love of all animals, but in her early years, she formed a strong bond to the local deer population. Now, she commands brave stags in combat, who rally to her when they are called.

specialty.description: Increases the speed of Moon Deer or Sun Deer by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 3 levels (rounded up).
specialty.name: Moon Deer
